lead_paragraph: There is probably no other track on the Formula One calendar that better illustrates the intricate relationship of cars, drivers, fans and circuit.

headline.print_headline: Short, Winding Road Produces Memorable Races
headline.main: A Legendary Short and Winding Road in Monaco
